1370: Coppesoeten was born in Scherbier straet in 1370.
Got married to Wijfgode at age 32 in 1370.
Had a son with Wijfgode, Egbertus, at age 32.
Lost son Egbertus when Egbertus was 1 years old.
1372: Had a son with Wijfgode, Eelbout, at age 34.
1373: Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Breghlent, at age 35.
1377: Had a son with Wijfgode, Wolbrand, at age 39.
1378: Had a son with Wijfgode, Kornillis, at age 40.
1382: Had a daughter with Wijfgode, Lelien, at age 44.
